text:
-Within the examination area,
Model City area,
Examiner waiting area.

name: Subaru
text:
...This is strange.
Pubraseer-san hasn't returned.

name: Hydoor
text:
Ah, since the civilian role isn't here,
there's really a limit to how much we can just
pick fights with examinees for no reason...

name: Subaru
text:
Apparently, [Player]-san sent a message
saying they were caught in some trouble,
and were going to help out...

Subaru checked his terminal, but
no further contact from Pubraseer
had come in yet.

name: Hydoor
text:
...Geez, can't be helped.
Let's move around a bit and
try to find Pubraseer.

name: Hydoor
text:
[Player] is also there, so
they should be able to transform,
I don't think that'll be a problem.

name: Subaru
text:
...That's right. I heard we're allowed
to move around quite freely, so
I have no objections. Shall we go?

name: Hydoor
text:
Ah... By the way, teach.
What's that thing hanging on that tree?

Hydoor pointed to a mysterious object
caught on a tree branch, swinging
and reflecting light.

name: Subaru
text:
...I don't know.
Just pick it up and see,
why don't you?

name: Hydoor
text:
What, you're so cold...
—Yoink!

Hydoor jumped and grabbed it,
realizing it was light and hard.

name: Hydoor
text:
...What is this?
Is it a part of some machine?

name: Subaru
text:
At first glance, it appears so.
It's a bit burnt, so perhaps it was
broken and discarded.

name: Hydoor
text:
What, how boring.
...Haa, I'll just throw
it in the trash later.

name: Subaru
text:
...I'm surprised.
You do have such a sense
of morality after all.

name: Hydoor
text:
What, of course I do.
I can't stand it if things like that
are just dumped in the ocean.

Saying that, Hydoor put the part
into his pouch.

name: Hydoor
text:
Come on, teach, let's go.
Which way should we
head first?

name: Subaru
text:
We don't have any specific destination,
but for now, perhaps we should
aim towards the "Pillar of Light".

name: Subaru
text:
In an emergency, we'd head for headquarters anyway...
Oh, wait a moment. It seems a message
has arrived from the Operations Headquarters.

Subaru read through the message
displayed on his terminal.

name: Subaru
text:
............
...What on earth
does this mean?

name: Hydoor
text:
What is it, teach?
What did it say?

name: Subaru
text:
...It seems information has come in that an unidentified
intruder has been confirmed within the examination area,
and an investigation is currently underway.

name: Hydoor
text:
...Huh? No way, a villain?
Is there really someone who would deliberately
intrude into a place filled with heroes like this?

name: Subaru
text:
It's hard to believe, but...
It seems there's a high probability of that,
and a notification to be vigilant has arrived.

Subaru looked up and
turned to Hydoor.

name: Subaru
text:
—Regarding the continuation of the exam,
it seems we'll have to wait for further contact.

—Meanwhile, at the same time.
Within the examination area, in a corner
of the model city, the alleyway area.

name: Denebola
text:
...Haa, haa.
Just now, I sensed a person's
presence in this direction...

Denebola had been running around the city,
searching for [Player] and the others,
while observing his surroundings.

He finally spotted a figure
in front of him and called out.

name: Denebola
text:
—Hey!
You, are you [Player]!?
Please be [Player]!

However, the two who turned at his voice
were not the person he was looking for.

name: Denebola
text:
...What, it wasn't them.
Sorry, are you two examiners?

name: Yotaro
text:
Uhm... Before that, may I ask one thing?
Did you just call out to [Player]?

Catching his breath, Denebola
nodded at those words.

name: Denebola
text:
...Ah, that person has my
exam ticket.

name: Denebola
text:
My name is Denebola.
I thought if you were examiners,
you could do something about it...

Seeing his demeanor, Gaisei
approached Denebola.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Ho?
If I may be so bold, your movements—

name: Gaisei
text:
I perceive you to be a master
of considerable combat technique.
...How about you show me your skill?

name: Denebola
text:
H-Huh...?
Are you an examiner after all?

name: Yotaro
text:
...Gaisei-kun.
Was his explanation not enough for you?
This person is currently in trouble.

name: Gaisei
text:
I apologize for my rudeness.
In my eagerness for an enjoyable battle,
I omitted the necessary words.

name: Gaisei
text:
I, just like you,
am searching for [Player].
Meaning, I am in the midst of enduring—

name: Gaisei
text:
This thirst that gnaws within my stomach.
By all means, I ask that you fully satisfy it with your skill,
and engrave it upon this body.

Yotaro interjected between
Gaisei and Denebola, calling out.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Haa, you've lost sight of your objective.
For Gaisei-kun, that might be a
lot of patience he's showing, but...

name: Yotaro
text:
Excuse me, just to confirm,
could you have a battle against Gaisei-kun?

name: Denebola
text:
O-O-Oh...?
Does that mean...
The exam had already begun!?

name: Denebola
text:
I'm fine, but...!
W-Wait, first, please transform me!

name: Denebola
text:
I don't have my exam ticket with me, but if you check,
you'll know I'm an examinee!

name: Yotaro
text:
...Indeed, we can't find an Operator.
And there doesn't seem
to be anyone nearby either...

name: Denebola
text:
If I can't take this exam, my license...
My... My younger brother...!

name: Denebola
text:
Please, if you're an Operator,
transform me!

Saying that, Denebola
rushed towards Yotaro.

name: Yotaro
text:
Eh, b-but I've never transformed
anyone other than Gaisei-kun...

name: Yotaro
text:
Besides, you seem to be misunderstanding,
we are not examiners—

Just then, from the speakers
installed within the examination area,
an announcement suddenly began to play.

name: Announcer
text:
—This is an emergency announcement.
Multiple problems have been detected
in the Hero License Special Public Examination.

name: Announcer
text:
Currently, information has been received
about suspicious individuals who have illegally
infiltrated the examination area.

name: Announcer
text:
Additionally, some warp functions
are reported to be not operating normally,
and an investigation is underway.

name: Announcer
text:
The examination will be temporarily suspended
until the problems are resolved and safety is secured.
The resumption time is currently undecided.

name: Announcer
text:
Examinees and examiners supervising the
field are requested to prioritize
safety in their actions. Repeating—

name: Denebola
text:
...W-What!?
The test, is temporarily suspended...!?

Denebola, hearing the announcement of the exam's suspension,
turned pale with a shocked expression.

Then, he aggressively confronted
Gaisei and Yotaro,
snapping at them.

name: Denebola
text:
W-What do you mean, examiners!?
The exam—
What about my license...!?

name: Pubraseer
text:
—Phew, it seems all the surrounding
Kaibutsu have been defeated for now.
Orbiter, are you hurt?

name: Orbiter
text:
Yeah, I'm fine!
I did my best too—!
How was it, Captain, was I helpful?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, your support was very reassuring.
If you can fight that well, I'm relieved.

name: Orbiter
text:
Eheheh, yay—!
Captain praised me, [Player]!

Confirming that there was no
longer any sign of Kaibutsu nearby,
[Player] released their transformation.

name: Orbiter
text:
You two, you can count on my strength!
Leave the battles to me too!

name: Pubraseer
text:
Hahaha, that's reassuring.
...Looking at you,
really reminds me of my old days.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Old days?
Captain's stories, I want to hear them!

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, once this situation settles down,
let's have a good talk.

name: Orbiter
text:
Yeah, tell me lots!
About space, about spaceships...!
Oh, and what kind of training you did too!

Pubraseer gazed gently at
the innocently smiling Orbiter,
with a nostalgic expression.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Ah, when I was aiming to be an astronaut,
my comrades and I felt the same way.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Just single-mindedly aiming for space,
the attitude of being able to honestly say your love for it...

name: Pubraseer
text:
We had nothing but that.
...No, that was all we needed.
You reminded me of that a little, thank you.

name: Orbiter
text:
Is that so...?
But, if I could be of use to Captain,
I'm happy too!

At Pubraseer's words,
Orbiter made a puzzled expression
and smiled back.

Just then, [Player]'s terminal
was enveloped in a faint, warm light.

options.text: It's glowing differently than when it warps.

text:
As [Player] was distracted by the terminal,
Pubraseer approached them to change the subject.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Well now, [Player].
Warping, villains,
and now Kaibutsu too...

name: Pubraseer
text:
For now, I'll report back on
the Kaibutsu situation, but...

name: Pubraseer
text:
My original assigned Operator
suddenly disappeared too.
I thought it was just a coincidence, but—

name: Pubraseer
text:
Perhaps other Operators or
civilians may have already suffered
some kind of harm.

name: Orbiter
text:
T-That means someone might have
been eaten by a Kaibutsu...?

name: Pubraseer
text:
We don't know yet, but we should respond urgently.
However, in times like these,
let's calmly resolve problems one by one.

name: Orbiter
text:
That's right.
...Oh, wait a minute!

Orbiter noticed something and
hurriedly displayed his message window.

name: Pubraseer
text:
What's wrong, Orbiter?
Did something happen?

name: Orbiter
text:
Yeah, a message from
Denebola just arrived!

name: Orbiter
text:
He said he found a part of my spaceship!
He sent me the coordinates too!

name: Orbiter
text:
Hey, [Player].
First, why don't you give Denebola
his exam ticket back?

options.text: It must have been trouble for Denebola.

text:
[Player] and Pubraseer confirmed
the message that Orbiter showed them.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Hmm.
These coordinates are near
where we were just now.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Fortunately, the warping this time
didn't seem to have taken us too far.
It won't take much time either.

name: Pubraseer
text:
It would be best to head there
before the warp activates again.

Pubraseer looked up.
The "Pillar of Light" could be seen ahead.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Well then, let's meet up with Denebola first.
Is that alright with you, [Player]?

When [Player] nodded,
Orbiter cheerfully spoke aloud.
Then, he took the hands of the two.

name: Orbiter
text:
Then, let's go together!
To meet Denebola, let's go—!

Chapter 4:
If We Can Meet at the Guiding Light

name: Denebola
text:
—You guys,
you aren't examiners!?

Denebola's desperate cry
echoed through the alleyway.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Yes, both Gaisei-kun and I
are examinees, just like you.

name: Denebola
text:
T-Then, why did you
try to battle me earlier...!

name: Gaisei
text:
I have never said anything about an exam.
Just that, I wanted to battle you.

name: Denebola
text:
Haa...?
What are you...!?

Denebola sighed and slumped,
facing the two.

name: Denebola
text:
...No, but if you're examinees,
then you're in the same position as me.

name: Denebola
text:
The exam is also suspended.
What we can do now...
is nothing.

name: Gaisei
text:
Then, how about indulging
in a battle with me?
It might serve as a distraction.

name: Denebola
text:
Why, would you do something
that drains your stamina while the
exam is still under suspension...?

Denebola sighed again
at Gaisei and Yotaro's responses.

name: Denebola
text:
...But, I have to search for [Player].
I'll need my exam ticket when the exam resumes.

name: Denebola
text:
I'm going ahead first.
I can't be bothered any further.

name: Yotaro
text:
Look, Gaisei-kun.
He doesn't seem to want
to fight you.

name: Gaisei
text:
...His will seems firm.
I have no interest in those
without the will to fight.

name: Yotaro
text:
It's a sudden turn of events...
I'm sorry, my Gaisei-kun
caused you trouble.

name: Denebola
text:
...You guys are amazing.
You're the ones who picked a fight
unilaterally...

Just then, a familiar voice
reached the ears of the three.

options.text: Why are all three of you together!?

text:
[Player], Pubraseer, and Orbiter
rushed to the coordinates they were sent.

Not only Denebola, but also
Gaisei and Yotaro were standing
in front of them.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...This feels like the conversation
is going to get even more complicated.

name: Orbiter
text:
Denebola, sorry to keep you waiting!
I found [Player]!
What about my parts!?

name: Denebola
text:
[Player]!
You took my exam
ticket, didn't you!?

name: Denebola
text:
Give it back, I have to pass
the exam and find my brother!
...Though, the exam's already been suspended.

name: Gaisei
text:
Well, well, [Player]-dono.
I was looking for you.
How is your condition?

name: Gaisei
text:
I cannot wait any longer.
Come now, are you ready for battle?
Let me hear your condition!

name: Yotaro
text:
Gaisei-kun, wait a moment.
[Player]... What on earth is going on?

options.text: Can we talk one by one?

text:
Addressed from all sides,
[Player] shook their head.

name: Denebola
text:
...Hmm, it seems we're not getting anywhere.
But you, you suddenly disappeared, didn't you?
Could you not disappear again in the meantime...?

name: Orbiter
text:
Okay-!
Then, can I be the first to speak?

name: Orbiter
text:
Hey, Denebola,
is it true you found my parts?

name: Denebola
text:
Ah, this, right?
The spaceship part
you were talking about, Orbiter.

Denebola took out the part of the small spaceship
Orbiter was looking for from his pocket.

name: Orbiter
text:
Yeah, this is it!
The one I gave to [Player].
I'm so glad it was found!

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Hoh, so this is from a spaceship?
It's much smaller than I imagined.

name: Yotaro
text:
Oh, so that was a spaceship part.
...I see. Then, the ceiling incident that
was in the news came from this, right?

name: Yotaro
text:
If it's this size, as far as I know,
it's about the size of a one-person bicycle...
Is that about right?

name: Orbiter
text:
Yeah, that's right. This is the engine,
and then there's the seat, and the rudder for balance.
And there's only the shield left, but...

Saying that, Orbiter
held the part returned by Denebola
like they were precious to him.

name: Orbiter
text:
I'll collect everything again, and rebuild it!
Thank you, Denebola.

name: Denebola
text:
Ah, no problem.
Well, I found it on the way.
...Now, it's my turn.

name: Denebola
text:
[Player], please give me
my exam ticket back.
It's important to me.

Nodding at Denebola's words,
[Player] took out the exam ticket
from their bag.

name: Denebola
text:
Ah, this is it, no mistake.
For now, this will allow me to be
recognized as an examinee.

name: Denebola
text:
You didn't take it on purpose, did you?
...For now, please have my gratitudes.

Denebola received the card,
but contrary to his words,
his expression was not very bright.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Denebola
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, that doesn't matter now.
...You all heard it too, didn't you?
The exam has been temporarily suspended.

options.text: There was an announcement just now...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Denebola
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, you all must have heard it too.
The exam has been temporarily suspended.

name: Denebola
text:
I really want to go earn points
right away, but...

name: Denebola
text:
There was also an order to prioritize safety.
Rushing now would only make a bad impression.

Denebola muttered under his breath,
then took out combat rations from his pocket and
unenthusiastically popped them into his mouth.

name: Denebola
text:
All I can do now is conserve my stamina,
and be in perfect condition
when the exam resumes, and—

name: Denebola
text:
Just pray that the exam resumes.
Orbiter, do you want some too?
It's not delicious, but it's edible enough.

name: Orbiter
text:
Eh, m-me...?
N-No, I'm fine!
I'm not hungry at all...!

name: Denebola
text:
Really...? You must have been hungry running around.
It's fine, the expiration date hasn't passed yet.
You shouldn't get a stomachache.

name: Orbiter
text:
T-That's not what I meant, but...
I appreciate the thought.

Orbiter gave a wry smile.
Denebola, with a puzzled look,
brought the combat rations to his own mouth.

options.text: I thought you'd like this kind of thing.
I thought you were curious about this.

name: Orbiter
text:
Ah, yeah, I am curious, but...!
I don't really need it right now...

name: Gaisei
text:
...So, is everything alright now?
I am not very good at waiting.

name: Gaisei
text:
[Player]-dono, Pubraseer-dono.
I perceive that the preparations for
my battle with you are now complete?

Gaisei stepped forward, as if
intervening between the heroes.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Haa, as expected,
he absolutely wants to fight you, [Player].

name: Gaisei
text:
Of course, my purpose is to fight
strong opponents and hone my skills.
There is nothing else to it.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Hmm, [Player].
I was able to trick him successfully earlier,
but it will be difficult this time...

name: Pubraseer
text:
...It can't be helped.
If he insists on fighting us,
then I shall perceive him as a villain.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Now, it's not as an examiner,
but as a hero, that I must face them as.

At Pubraseer's words,
Denebola choked spectacularly on
the combat rations he was eating.

name: Orbiter
text:
D-Denebola, are you okay!?
What's wrong all of a sudden...!?

name: Denebola
text:
—Cough, g-wait, w-wait!?
You, are you a "real" examiner this time!?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, yes, I am.
I am Pubraseer, an examiner.
You're Denebola, I've heard about you.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I'll also report your situation
to the Operations Headquarters.
But for now, I must deal with these two villains.

Pubraseer turned his gaze
to Yotaro and Gaisei.

name: Denebola
text:
...Could it be, the suspicious individuals
mentioned in the announcement earlier...!

name: Yotaro
text:
...As expected, investigating undercover
with Gaisei-kun was impossible.

name: Gaisei
text:
I have no intention of hiding.
If the enemy attacks with numbers, then I
shall become a demon, and return it with my own skill.

name: Yotaro
text:
It was no good the moment we first
encountered [Player] and the others...
It's what you call "the end of luck".

Denebola glared sharply at the two.
In his gaze, a clear fighting spirit
towards the villains could be felt.

name: Gaisei
text:
—Hoh, you refused earlier, but
are you also going to face me?
Splendid, my enjoyment will increase.

name: Denebola
text:
...[Player], transform me.
You already recieved my
contract earlier, didn't you?

name: Orbiter
text:
D-Denebola, are you angry...?
Fighting is bad, let's stop it here!

name: Denebola
text:
I am calm.
...But if these guys are here,
I won't be able to take the exam.

name: Denebola
text:
That's what troubles me the most.
Examiner... Pubraseer.
Please allow me to fight.

name: Denebola
text:
Although I don't yet have the qualifications as a hero,
I make a living by transforming and fighting daily
on another planet.

name: Denebola
text:
If it's a battle,
I won't be a hindrance.
...Please.

Pubraseer nodded in response
to Denebola's earnest plea.

name: Orbiter
text:
[Player], transform me again!
I don't want anyone to get hurt!

name: Pubraseer
text:
...[Player], could you please
transform all three of us?
I'll take responsibility for this situation.

name: Pubraseer
text:
They are villains who enjoy combat,
so whether we fight or flee,
I want us to be transformed.

name: Gaisei
text:
..."Observer", I will also transform.
Finally, the enjoyable feast could begin!

name: Yotaro
text:
Haa...
As expected, it always turns out 'this' way, doesn't it?
Understood, here we go.

Transformation complete, Parallel Weapons
are held by each, heroes and villains alike.

name: Gaisei
text:
[Player]-dono, once again
engrave your skill upon me—

Just as Gaisei,
with a pleased expression,
was about to move-

Suddenly, [Player] shouted loudly,
stepping in-between everyone.

At [Player]'s words,
Yotaro also checked his surroundings.

name: Yotaro
text:
...This taste and smell.
It's definitely Kaibutsu.
Gaisei-kun, be careful.

name: Yotaro
text:
It seems the entire
area is already surrounded.

Yotaro glared sharply at a nearby shadow.
There, Kaibutsu had already formed a horde.

name: Orbiter
text:
Those aren't robots like earlier...
Right, [Player]?

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Kuh!
Just when we were about to
battle villains, now Kaibutsu again...!

name: Pubraseer
text:
Gaisei, wait a moment!
First, the Kaibutsu-

As Pubraseer was about to turn to the villains,
two figures and a gust of wind swept past him.

name: Gaisei
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">Don't you dare

name: Denebola
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">interrupt in

name: Gaisei & Denebola
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">our battle!!

name: Gaisei
text:
To fully enjoy this blissful feast, I have endured until now.
I am now extremely displeased.

name: Gaisei
text:
I have no interest in the weak,
but if you insist on interfering,
I will not hesitate slice you up in an instant.

name: Denebola
text:
You're all ganging up to interfere!
Don't you mess with me!
If you get in my way, I won't go easy on you!

The two leaped at the Kaibutsu,
and proceeded to cut down the surrounding Kaibutsu.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Haa, am I supposed
to be operating this?

name: Yotaro
text:
It can't be helped, [Player].
Let's have a joint command.
It's like "being in the same boat".

Saying and letting out a sigh,
Yotaro raised his voice towards Gaisei.

name: Yotaro
text:
Gaisei-kun, come back.
This is a chance to experience
[Player]'s operation up close!

name: Gaisei
text:
A good suggestion, "Observer"!
You intend to reveal each other's tactics
and further liven up the later feast, don't you!?

Gaisei laughed at Yotaro's words,
and instantly rushed to where
[Player] and the others were.

At [Player]'s signal,
Pubraseer and Orbiter also
shifted into combat stance.

name: Orbiter
text:
Just like before, all we have
to do is to defeat the Kaibutsu, right?
Leave it to me!

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, but carelessness is your greatest enemy.
Let's be careful, Orbiter.

name: Pubraseer
text:
These are unfamiliar Kaibutsu, so we
don't know what kind of attacks they'll use.
Don't overdo yourself.

name: Orbiter
text:
Okay, understood, Captain!
[Player], let's fight together!

name: Pubraseer
text:
Denebola, keep up the guerrilla attacks!
In case of emergency, I want you to
secure a retreat path for everyone!

name: Denebola
text:
Understood!
You guys concentrate on your own battle!

Pubraseer precisely addressed the two,
then turned to [Player] and smiled gently.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Come now, [Player]. The situation is complicated,
but let's deal with it one by one.
I'm looking forward to your operation!
Battle Start

name: Denebola
text:
—Take this!
Alright, finally, their numbers have decreased.

name: Denebola
text:
I'm done over here.
Orbiter, Pubraseer!
Are you two alright?

Denebola's Parallel Weapon pierced the
Kaibutsu, leaving smoke to rise out of them.

Pubraseer and Orbiter,
who had also been defeating Kaibutsu,
responded to Denebola's words.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, you have been a great help, Denebola.
I'm just finished here too.
Orbiter also seems unharmed.

name: Orbiter
text:
Yeah, I'm fine!
[Player], don't worry.
I'll protect you properly!

[Player] and the others confirmed the situation,
then turned their gaze to the villains
who were also fighting.

name: Yotaro
text:
Gaisei-kun, Kaibutsu are aiming from behind.
It seems to be the last few, please be careful!

name: Gaisei
text:
When fighting someone stronger than oneself,
taking them by surprise is a good move, but...
That's only possible with skill.

name: Gaisei
text:
If you dare to interfere, you will
come to know my skill with your own body—
Like this!

name: Gaisei
text:
—"Battle Blade",
Demon's Claw of Destruction, First Form!

Within the area replicating a narrow alleyway,
Gaisei's arm sliced through the surrounding
Kaibutsu along with everything else.

name: Orbiter
text:
S-Such tremendous power...
He even cut through the wall of the building.

name: Yotaro
text:
H-Hiee...! G-Gaisei-kun!
You're not supposed to break buildings!

name: Gaisei
text:
...What leisurely things are you saying?
This unworthy one's blade doesn't choose what it cuts,
there happened to be a wall within reach, that's all.

name: Pubraseer
text:
U-Uhm.
If it weren't a model city,
I would certainly have warned him...

name: Pubraseer
text:
Fortunately, there are no residents here,
and no human presence other than us. Besides,
I heard it will be cleared after the exam.

name: Pubraseer
text:
When it comes to dealing with Kaibutsu damage,
they'll probably turn a blind eye to some extent.

Upon defeating the last one,
Gaisei checked the condition of his own body.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Hmm, it was just enough for a warm-up.
Though it was a bit unsatisfying.

name: Gaisei
text:
"Observer", [Player]-dono.
Do you sense the presence
of any other Kaibutsu nearby?

name: Yotaro
text:
No... I no longer sense the
smell of Kaibutsu nearby.
How about you, [Player]?

At Yotaro's words,
[Player] closed their eyes and
focused their awareness.

options.text: I can still faintly sense it...

text:
[Player] opened their eyes and
followed the presence with their gaze.
Beyond that—

options.text: It's in the direction of the "Pillar of Light".
It seems there was one that escaped.

name: Yotaro
text:
You can even sense faint presences...
Is this the extent of your observation ability, [Player]?

name: Denebola
text:
But, I thought all the Kaibutsu
we fought were eliminated...

name: Orbiter
text:
Oh, but, there was a very fast one, right?
I lost sight of it halfway through...

name: Pubraseer
text:
If that presence is a Kaibutsu that escaped,
does that mean it was intimidated by us...?

name: Yotaro
text:
Kaibutsu are beings that devour
anything and anyone indiscriminately.
I don't think they have such sentience, though...

While the group talked, Gaisei
shrugged his shoulders with an indifferent expression.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Is that so?
However, weak beings that flee
from battle are not my enemies.

name: Gaisei
text:
I have little interest in opponents
who cannot steal techniques, nor possess
enough power to test my techniques.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Kaibutsu attack people, and completely
steal their memories... Their living,
breathing proof of being, completely.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Even if they are small and weak now,
we cannot simply ignore the possibility
of them becoming such a threat.

options.text: Because they can gather and become huge.
I've had a tough time with them before, Gaisei.

text:
At [Player]'s words,
Gaisei reacted with surprise.
Then, he laughed with amusement.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Hoh, that's interesting.
Even [Player]-dono struggles against them.

name: Gaisei
text:
Such powerful beings are lurking nearby?
...That sounds a little enjoyable.

Against Gaisei, who said that,
Denebola once again quietly muttered.
There was a suppressed fighting spirit within his words.

name: Denebola
text:
...However, you, Gaisei,
are interfering with the exam right now.

name: Denebola
text:
As long as you are in this venue, the exam won't resume.
We lost time with the Kaibutsu commotion, but-

name: Denebola
text:
This time, I'll defeat you two,
and... resume the exam!

He held his Parallel Weapon,
and took a combat stance against Gaisei.

name: Gaisei
text:
...That's a good suggestion.
Your thoughts on combat,
I find very pleasing.

name: Gaisei
text:
Strength, is for survival.
And, for making one's
ideals a reality—

name: Gaisei
text:
Come now, show me your
exceptional skill and power... Mmmh!

Yotaro covered the mouth of Gaisei,
who was speaking happily, with both hands from the front.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Gaisei-kun, please just
hold it right there.
You are Denebola, right?

name: Yotaro
text:
Your worries are unfounded.
Our infiltration has already been discovered,
so we won't stay long.

name: Orbiter
text:
...What do you mean?
Are you two going home without battling?

name: Yotaro
text:
Yes. If things can be settled peacefully,
there's nothing better.
It's like "life is precious".

name: Yotaro
text:
Of course, this is on the condition that you overlook it,
but I intend to release my transformation
and leave as soon as possible.

name: Yotaro
text:
Besides, if Kaibutsu are appearing now,
isn't it better to prioritize dealing with them?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Indeed, what Yotaro says makes sense.
Dealing with Kaibutsu is more important
than starting a battle here now.

name: Denebola
text:
Mmm...
What, are you two leaving
right away?

name: Orbiter
text:
Then, Denebola, you won't
have to fight either, right?

name: Denebola
text:
Ah, that's right...
I don't particularly want to battle anyway.

name: Denebola
text:
If the two of you leave, the exam will resume,
and my problem will be resolved...
Then, there's no need to battle.

options.text: It does mean letting the villains go, but...
Dealing with Kaibutsu is a higher priority.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Mph.
What are you saying, "Observer"?
Strong heroes are better than weak Kaibutsu.

name: Gaisei
text:
Quickly, ready
your Parallel Weapon-

As Gaisei shook off Yotaro's hands,
an announcement began to play
from overhead again.

name: Announcer
text:
—Emergency update.
The appearance of Kaibutsu has been confirmed
within the examination area and around the "Pillar of Light".

name: Announcer
text:
Examinees and the general public
are requested to evacuate
to a safe location immediately.

name: Announcer
text:
Heroes and Operators available for dispatch
who are currently in the vicinity are requested to
deal with the situation urgently. Repeating—

name: Orbiter
text:
T-This announcement...!
[Player], Captain,
will they be okay...?

name: Pubraseer
text:
...It seems that other individuals
besides the escaped Kaibutsu
have been confirmed.

name: Pubraseer
text:
[Player], your problem is
not yet resolved, but...
Will you fight with us?

name: Pubraseer
text:
While dealing with the Kaibutsu,
let's search for a way to resolve
your warping phenomenon.

options.text: I intend to do that too!

text:
Just as [Player] replied to Pubraseer.
[Player]'s terminal announced an incoming call.

Confirming the caller,
[Player] immediately
connected the call.

name: Crowne
text:
—[Player],
can you hear me?

name: Crowne
text:
I'm sorry for making such an urgent call,
but I'll report the matter on my end first.

—The observation seats of the examination venue were
already filled with a bustling atmosphere.

In one corner, the members of Parallel Flight Inc.
were gathered around Crowne's terminal.

name: Crowne
text:
First, about the anomaly I was investigating,
where you suddenly got warped.

name: Crowne
text:
Since then, I've been trying to contact
the control room for confirmation, but...
There's absolutely no response.

name: Crowne
text:
Moreover, the people at the Operations Headquarters
have vague memories, and most of them don't
remember the person in charge of the control room.

name: Mokdai
text:
C-Crowne-san!
Does that mean...!

name: Crowne
text:
...Ah, that's right.
[Player], you know what this means, right?

options.text: No way, have they already done damage...!?

name: Akashi
text:
Crowne-san, does that mean [Player]'s
warpings happened because of them?

name: Crowne
text:
...Unfortunately, I haven't been able to
investigate that far yet.

name: Huckle
text:
But, at the very least, it's highly likely
that some problem has occurred
in the control room.

name: Crowne
text:
Ah, there were no anomalous points
in [Player]'s terminal's operation history logs.
So the problem is on the control system side...

name: Mokdai
text:
...It can only be that
something has happened inside
the "Pillar of Light".

name: Crowne
text:
For now, what I've understood is that the control
system's effective range is only within the examination
area and a part of the "Pillar of Light".

name: Sui
text:
Then, if [Player]-san somehow
escapes from the examination area,
the effect will disappear?

Crowne nodded with a serious expression
at Sui's words.

name: Crowne
text:
...At first, I thought the control system
was activating the warp through the terminal,
but that wasn't it.

name: Crowne
text:
The terminal is merely a console.
As long as the system is within the area of operation,
it should still warp the users even if the terminal is removed.

name: Crowne
text:
In that case, it's safer not to remove the terminal,
since there are still warning sounds and communication possible.
Anyway, you just have to get out of that area.

name: Crowne
text:
I'll investigate a bit more, but...
Since I can't talk to the person in charge now,
please remember that as the best solution.

name: Huckle
text:
[Player]-kun, I also have
something to tell you.

As Crowne finished speaking,
Huckle stepped forward,
taking her place.

name: Huckle
text:
As already announced,
Kaibutsu have appeared.

name: Huckle
text:
Moreover, the rate of the Kaibutsu's appearance
seems abnormally fast. It seems there's a
split body separate from the main body.

name: Huckle
text:
The split body should also have a
pseudo-core like the main body. It's possible
to deal with it by destroying that.

name: Ryekie
text:
So, it's no different
from other Kaibutsu!

name: Huckle
text:
Ah, however, as long as the main body isn't defeated,
the split bodies could appear endlessly...

name: Huckle
text:
We also want to hurry to the
scene to provide support...
But another problem has arisen.

From behind Huckle,
the voices of heroes from other agencies
talking to staff members could be heard.

name: Hero
text:
—Hurry, we must head to the "Pillar of Light"
to subjugate the Kaibutsu!

name: Hero
text:
Either release the barrier,
or warp us there, just get us out of here!

name: Staff member
text:
...W-We sincerely apologize.
The observation seats are protected by a barrier,
and unless it's released, you can't go outside...!

name: Staff member
text:
Regarding warp control, we are urgently confirming with
the control room and Operations Headquarters.
Please, wait just a little longer...!

name: Huckle
text:
...As you've heard.
We can't afford to be stuck here, but...

name: Akashi
text:
We're trapped
in this place, huh...

name: Sui
text:
It was supposed to be a perfect
defense, but it's backfired...
Can we only wait...?

name: Ryekie
text:
[Player], we'll head to the "Pillar of Light"
as soon as we can get out of here!!

name: Huckle
text:
I've also shared the current situation
with Melide and the others outside.
They should also be dealing with the problem.

name: Huckle
text:
...[Player]-kun.
Once your problem is resolved,
I'd like you to lend them your strength.

name: Huckle
text:
Also, we are observing your
battle stream over here.
...Please be careful not to get injured.

options.text: Don't worry, I won't overdo it!

text:
[Player] replied to Huckle, who spoke with concern,
and then ended the call.

name: Mokdai
text:
...Uhm, it's really frustrating that
problems are happening in various places,
but all we can do is wait.

name: Akashi
text:
Ah...
But now, we just have to believe.
I think that's what we can do.

name: Sui
text:
Yeah, I think so too.
...Once we can move,
let's go help everyone immediately.

options.text: Problems also occurred in the observation seats...
What on earth is happening behind the scenes?

text:
[Player] ended the call and
returned their gaze to Pubraseer and the others.

name: Orbiter
text:
What's wrong, [Player]?
...Are you okay?

name: Pubraseer
text:
[Player], did you find out anything?
...Could you tell us?

[Player] nodded and
summarized the previous conversation.

name: Pubraseer
text:
—I see. In that case, to resolve [Player]'s problem,
we have no choice but to leave here.

name: Orbiter
text:
And, there are people who were
attacked by Kaibutsu, right?
...We have to help them quickly!

[Player] nodded
at Orbiter's words.

options.text: We have to chase the Kaibutsu!
Let's head to the "Pillar of Light".
It'll be an escape from the exam area too!

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, that's right.
If we head to the "Pillar of Light",
your problem will also be resolved.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...However, the examination area itself is
also protected by the same barrier.
The problem is how to get out of here...

name: Denebola
text:
...Hm?
Speaking of which, Orbiter.

name: Denebola
text:
Even though there's a barrier,
how did you get inside the examination area?

name: Orbiter
text:
Eh, me?
I just fell from the ceiling...
I didn't do anything special.

name: Pubraseer
text:
That's quite a special method... However,
in that case, it seems the barrier
is only set up to a certain height.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I heard the wall is quite high, so perhaps
the assumption is that there's no need
to cover the ceiling section.

name: Orbiter
text:
Then, how did Yotaro and Gaisei get in?
Like me, from the ceiling?

Yotaro shook his head
at Orbiter's question.

name: Yotaro
text:
No, we registered by
pretending to be examinees,
so it's the same as Denebola.

name: Yotaro
text:
We entered with everyone else
using the examinee entrance warp.

name: Denebola
text:
...Don't you say that so calmly.
Truly, the audacity of a villain.

During that conversation,
Gaisei continued to gaze around
indifferently.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Are you finished?
I am bored.
Let me hear your plans.

options.text: He's not fazed by the current conversation...
He's indifferent to anything other than battles, huh?

name: Pubraseer
text:
I, of course, intend to head towards the
Kaibutsu subjugation together with [Player].

name: Pubraseer
text:
I cannot... leave the Kaibutsu be.
I must rescue the attacked people
as quickly as possible.

name: Denebola
text:
I was told by the announcement
to secure my own safety, but...
Pubraseer, I need to consult you.

name: Denebola
text:
If you, the examiner, permit it,
I would like to accompany you.
I want a chance to contribute, even a little.

name: Pubraseer
text:
You're an honest one, Denebola.
You also have enough skill,
so I would be grateful if you could cooperate.

name: Orbiter
text:
Then, me too!
I'll fight with Captain and the others!
I'll definitely be helpful!

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Ah, that's right.
I can't leave Orbiter here alone.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Please accompany us
as safely as possible.
...Could you promise me that?

name: Orbiter
text:
Yeah, I promise!
I'll definitely protect it!
It's a promise with Captain!

name: Orbiter
text:
I'll also do my best to be like
an astronaut captain, [Player]!

As Orbiter smiled back, Gaisei, who was watching,
brushed off some dust and started walking.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Well then, it seems
the discussion is settled,
so shall we go?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gaisei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What is it, [Player]-dono?
If I don't defeat the Kaibutsu quickly, you won't be able to battle me, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gaisei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course.
If I don't defeat those Kaibutsu, I won't be able to battle you, right?

name: Gaisei
text:
Besides, if I act with [Player]-dono,
there's a possibility of
fighting a formidable enemy—

name: Gaisei
text:
With all due respect, there's no
reason for me not to accompany you.
Come now, let us go...!

name: Yotaro
text:
Haa...
The longer we stay, the higher
the risk of us getting caught.

name: Yotaro
text:
As for me, I'd like to take advantage of
the Kaibutsu' commotion and just leave as is...

name: Yotaro
text:
If Gaisei-kun is 'like this', then it's "all over".
It can't be helped now, so shall we go?

Yotaro shook his head with a 'good grief' expression,
opened his terminal, and averted his gaze.

name: Yotaro
text:
(Regarding the Hero License,
further information gathering
seems unlikely...)

name: Yotaro
text:
([Player].
I'd like to gather a little
more information about you.)

name: Yotaro
text:
(...That strength of yours, the reason
Gaisei-kun thinks highly of you, and...
............)

options.text: Hmm, he'll be a great hand, but...

text:
As [Player] let out a troubled voice,
Denebola crossed his arms and spoke to them.

name: Denebola
text:
Wait, [Player].
It's not all bad.
...I think.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Denebola...?
Do you have an idea?

name: Denebola
text:
...I admit, Gaisei is a nuisance
who interfered with the exam.

name: Denebola
text:
...But if he says he'll leave after this is over,
I have nothing more to say.

name: Denebola
text:
I felt it when we fought together,
that I understand his desire for strength a little.
...Because I grew up in a similar environment.

Denebola, still with crossed arms,
directed a scrutinizing gaze towards Gaisei.

name: Denebola
text:
My people prioritize "strength".
So, I can understand Gaisei's way of thinking.
...And, he should be the same.

options.text: Well, leaving him alone might be a problem too.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...That's right.
[Player], we will ensure your safety.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Regarding Gaisei,
there are still some things I can't quite grasp,
but for now, he seems to be behaving... Hm?

Just then, [Player]'s terminal
began to emit a grating alert sound.
[Player] hurriedly gathered everyone.

name: Orbiter
text:
[Player], I don't want you to
disappear again, okay!?
W-What should I do...!

name: Gaisei
text:
...This sound, 'again'?
I cannot afford to lose sight of you here.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, understood!
[Player], come, your hand.
Orbiter, come here too.

name: Orbiter
text:
Y-Yeah!
It's okay, I've got it!
Is this good...?

name: Denebola
text:
Orbiter, I'll borrow your free hand.
...Is this okay?

name: Yotaro
text:
W-What is it...?
No, I don't seem to have the
leisure to ask now.

name: Yotaro
text:
Gaisei-kun, come on, over here.
Hold my hand and [Player]'s hand.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Oh, so this is the countermeasure.
Very well.

Everyone joined hands,
forming a circle.

Meanwhile, the intervals of the alert sound
gradually grew shorter, and
the group was enveloped in a pale blue light—
